articles.title: Bragg singled Daniel Penny out, but mentally ill are real subway threat
articles.description: Whether Manhattan DA Alvin Bragg is trying to make an example of Penny because it’s politically convenient is irrelevant to the larger problem: Dangerous people running around free in the subway system.
articles.content:
Yes, there are differences between the Daniel Penny case and that of “J train stabber” Jordan Williams.
The man Penny killed, disturbed vagrant Jordan Neely, had not (far as we know) attacked any passengers in the subway car where he was making viole... [1629 chars]

articles.title: Indiana Jones and the perils of sequelizing Steven Spielberg
articles.description: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny is the latest example of how hard it is to make a sequel to a Steven Spielberg movie.

articles.title: Meituan's insider AI deal does not compute
articles.description: China's artificial intelligence frenzy has generated some eyebrow-raising deals; a purchase by Meituan is the latest example. The company on Thursday said it is buying AI firm Light Year from Meituan co-founder and former director Wang Huiwen, who only resigned from the $100 billion food delivery outfit days ago due to health reasons.
articles.content: HONG KONG, June 30 (Reuters Breakingviews) - China's artificial intelligence frenzy has generated some eyebrow-raising deals; a purchase by Meituan (3690.HK) is the latest example. The company on Thursday said it is buying AI firm Light Year from Mei... [1679 chars]

articles.description: Critics on Tuesday seized on the latest Trump tape as a perfect example of why the twice-impeached, twice-indicted former president is unfit to return to the Oval Office.

articles.title: DeepMind claims its next system Gemini will best ChatGPT
articles.description: DeepMind's success in beating a human Go champion is a stellar example of its capabilities in AI. Can it apply these techniques to language models and outperform GPT?

articles.title: Man on probation, with 13 arrests since 2014, accused of robbing 3 Dallas stores in 5 days
articles.description: The case was used as an example of a new initiative by Dallas ATF and Dallas police as it looks to curb violent crime across Dallas.
articles.content:
A new initiative announced by Dallas ATF and Dallas Police looks to curb violent crime across Dallas.
The plan is to prosecute violent offenders, especially repeat offenders in the federal system.

articles.title: Undaunted, Abbi Pulling forges her own path to Formula 1: ‘It was all my choice’
articles.description: She has a fresh start in F1 Academy and an example to set. “I eat, breathe, and sleep motorsport.”

articles.title: 16 Gross Fast Food Stories That Will Haunt You Forever
articles.description: How bad is it? Let me give you an example: "Her manager put the chicken on the floor and used a dirty mop to drag it around before putting it in a box and serving it to the customer."
articles.content:
2.
